title: Dear Riot Games (about 10th anniversary stuff)
body:
I have been playing LOL for 10 months to a year so far and I have not gotten your Krazy Kewl Icon yet. I really want one. I also understand and will wait till' the 30th to get the anniversary stuff and will contact you after that if I don't get one by then.  Thanks
Yours Truly,
A Fan And A Player

replies.body:
I appreciate your patience and understanding. We'll get those gifts out to you, friend. ^.^

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
